pageContext.claim: “Many Trump Fans & Signs were outside of the @FoxNews Studio last night in the now thriving (Thank you President Trump) Bethlehem, Pennsylvania, for the interview with Crazy Bernie Sanders. Big complaints about not being let in-stuffed with Bernie supporters. What’s with @FoxNews?”
pageContext.analysis: Bethlehem Mayor Bob Donchez and former mayor Don Cunningham corrected the president's claim about Bethlehem's trajectory noting, “The reality is that Bethlehem’s been thriving for quite some time and it was decades in the making as far as transitioning from one economy to another.” In other words, the city was transitioning away from an economy centered on steel manufacturing well before Trump took office.
